title: Kaitou Tenshi Twin Angel: Kyun Kyun☆Tokimeki Paradise!! OVA
original_name: 快盗天使ツインエンジェル キュンキュン ☆ ときめきパラダイス!! OVA
opening_song: "Onna no Ko tte♪ Maji☆ Koenjeru!! (オンナのコって ♪ マジ ☆ 超えんじぇる!!)" by ave;new project feat. Saori Sakura & Rie Shirazawa
ending_song: "Equal=Dream (イコール=ドリーム)" by Lilica Astadire (CV
sinopse: The OVA will be pre-sold during the Comiket 87 starting on December 28, 2014, regular retail distribution of the limited edition package will start on January 30, 2015.
